      • makeBBDAPI

        public static <R extends IBBDRow<IBBDField>> IBBDAPI<R> makeBBDAPI(java.lang.String database,
                                                                   java.lang.String spName,
                                                                   java.lang.String sql,
                                                                   java.lang.Class<R> rowClass)
        Construct an IBBDAPI object.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Any IBBDRow object.
        Parameters:
        database - Name of database to use.
        spName - Name of stored procedure.
        sql - Any valid SQL string.
        rowClass - The class of the row type that is created and populated row data from the result set when the API is used in a database transaction.
        Returns:
        IBBDAPI interface to new BBD API object.

      • makeBBDBeanConnection

        public static IBBDBeanConnection makeBBDBeanConnection()
        This connection type supports database transactions using POJOs.
        Returns:
        IBBDBeanConnection interface to a BBD Bean database connection.

      • makeBBDConnection

        public static IBBDConnection makeBBDConnection()
        This connection supports database transactions where data model rows have been created to model the result set of the transaction.
        Returns:
        IBBDConnection interface to a BBD database connection.
